The best way to learn about negotiation is to practice, either in real-life situations or through simulations. What is the best way to keep a conversation going?

The best way to keep a conversation going is to be genuinely interested in the other person and to actively listen to what they have to say. This means paying attention to their words, body language, and tone of voice, and responding in a way that shows you are engaged and curious. It's also important to ask open-ended questions that encourage the other person to share more about their thoughts and feelings, and to avoid interrupting or dominating the conversation.
